meanings.definition: A system of underground tunnels or passageways used for utility services.
meanings.sent1: The city's utilidors help keep the streets clear of pipes and wires.
meanings.sent2: The utilidors beneath the hospital ensure a smooth flow of electricity and water.
meanings.sent3: The mice in the utilidors were always getting lost and causing mischief.
meanings.sent4: The utilidors were like hidden veins, carrying essential services throughout the city.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the utilidors felt like delving into a secret world beneath our feet.

meanings.definition: The utilidors at Disney World are used for transporting employees and supplies.
meanings.sent1: Tourists are not allowed in the utilidors to maintain the magic of the park.
meanings.sent2: The utilidors efficiently connect different areas of the theme park.
meanings.sent3: Mickey Mouse loves to skateboard through the utilidors when off-duty.
meanings.sent4: The utilidors hum with the energy of a bustling backstage world.
meanings.sent5: In the utilidors, the heartbeat of Disney World echoes through hidden corridors.
